message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $15,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $10,000.
Bob, I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product.  While $15,000 reflects its true worth, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,500?
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am still aiming to keep within my budget. Could we agree on $11,000 for the product?
